summary: Have you tired of the dull stats that beast races have? If you answer yes this mod is for you it adds frost resistance to khajiit and fire resistance at argonians and more see pics
descriptionHtml:
News
--------------------------------
Added 4 new files 
1:Argonian Alone 
Argonian Only : 20% fire resistance 50% poison resistance and 15 damage claws
--------------------------------------
2:Khajiit Fire 
Khajiit Only:Muffle (from perk tree sneak ) and 20% fire resistance damage
--------------------------------------------------
3:Khajiit Frost 
Khajiit only : Muffle (from perk tree sneak ) and 20% frost resistance damage
------------------------------------------------------------
4:Khajiit Both 
Muffle (from perk tree sneak ) and 10% frost resistance damage 10% fire resistance damage
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Also i am 90% sure that you can combine them if not tell me to know it hope you like it :D

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I never liked the normal stats at the beast race because i thought they were very few this mode promises to changes that by adding natural muffle for Khajiit and frost resistance to Khajiit 20 % it also changes the race discription for both Argonian and Khajiit . Another thing it does it adds claws for Argonian resitane to fire 20% and reistance to poison 50% . You can either download it with NMM (Nexus Mod Manager ) or downloading manually unzip it and place it at \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data then when you  or by downloading manually unzip it and place it at \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data then when you open skyrim and go at data files and then you select Better Beast Races Stats (if it is not already selected ) .Have fun with it  hope you like and leave a comment or ask me questions  :D
author: Garuger
